channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join the top tech pundits in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech.
channel.itunes:summary: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join the top tech pundits in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech. Records live at https://twit.tv/live every Sunday at 6:00pm Eastern / 3:00pm Pacific / 22:00 UTC.
channel.description: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join the top tech pundits in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech. Records live at https://twit.tv/live every Sunday at 6:00pm Eastern / 3:00pm Pacific / 22:00 UTC.
channel.itunes:keywords: TWiT, TechTV, Leo Laporte, Kevin Rose, Patrick Norton, John C. Dvorak

item.title: TWiT 546: Do I Look Like an Angel to You?
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.author: leo@twit.tv (Leo Laporte)
item.description:
Host: Leo Laporte

Guests: Erin Griffith, Om Malik, and Iain Thomson

Facebook’s internet.org, journalistic orthodoxy, Twitter upheaval, and more.

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/this-week-in-tech

Bandwidth for This Week in Tech is provided by Cachefly.
